snippet.title: Minegeon: Renegades - Trailer
snippet.description:
Minegeon: Renegades
MineGeon: Renegades is a roguelite resource-gathering game where you can play solo or with friends. Equip yourself to explore various dungeons, conquer them, and gather resources within the mines to enhance your skills and equipment, allowing you to delve even deeper into the unknown. 

With an established player base from its predecessor and positive reception, we are seeking funding for the development of the sequel.

Obtenlo/Get It/ Obtê-lo/ここで購入:
store.steampowered.com/app/3227240/MineGeon_Renegades/

Redes/Socials/Redes Sociais/SNS:
